title: Property deeds (warranty, quitclaim, grant)
dataVerified: Grantor/grantee names, property address, legal description, notary
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents forged property transfers. Domain binding verifies county recorder/government. Permanent ownership records. Prevents deed fraud. Multi-page: Legal descriptions may span multiple pages - each page can have verify line.
